body:
clang-redist-linux
==================

This project provides packages for x86 and x86-64 Linux distributions
containing Clang, Clang libraries, and GCC libraries (e.g. libstdc++).  The
packages provide a C++11 toolchain, and they provide the Clang libraries
needed for the SourceWeb indexer.

Binaries from the current 2012-12-30 release were built on x86 and x86-64
Ubuntu 10.04.  They should work on most currently supported Linux distributions,
which have libc and libstdc++ libraries no older than those in Ubuntu 10.04.
This includes:

 - Debian 6.0.
 - Ubuntu 10.04 and up.
 - Fedora 16 and up.
 - OpenSUSE 12.1 and up.
 - CentOS 6.x.

The packages will not work on CentOS 5.x, which uses libstdc++-4.2.

## Download links:

| Package        | x86           | x86-64        |
| -------------- | ------------- | ------------- |
| Clang 3.2      | [Download][1] | [Download][2] |
| gcc-libs 4.6.3 | [Download][3] | [Download][4] |
| gcc-libs 4.7.2 | [Download][5] | [Download][6] |

[1]: https://s3.amazonaws.com/rprichard-released-software/clang-redist-linux/release_20121230/clang-3.2-x86-linux.tar.bz2
[2]: https://s3.amazonaws.com/rprichard-released-software/clang-redist-linux/release_20121230/clang-3.2-x86_64-linux.tar.bz2
[3]: https://s3.amazonaws.com/rprichard-released-software/clang-redist-linux/release_20121230/gcc-libs-4.6.3-x86-linux.tar.bz2
[4]: https://s3.amazonaws.com/rprichard-released-software/clang-redist-linux/release_20121230/gcc-libs-4.6.3-x86_64-linux.tar.bz2
[5]: https://s3.amazonaws.com/rprichard-released-software/clang-redist-linux/release_20121230/gcc-libs-4.7.2-x86-linux.tar.bz2
[6]: https://s3.amazonaws.com/rprichard-released-software/clang-redist-linux/release_20121230/gcc-libs-4.7.2-x86_64-linux.tar.bz2

## Usage

Extract the clang package and one gcc-libs package into the same directory.
Passing `--strip-components=1` to tar is helpful for doing this.  e.g.:

    mkdir clang-3.2-gcc-libs-4.6.3
    cd clang-3.2-gcc-libs-4.6.3
    tar --strip-components=1 -xf ../clang-3.2-x86-linux.tar.bz2
    tar --strip-components=1 -xf ../gcc-libs-4.6.3-x86-linux.tar.bz2

Note that at run-time, the binaries produced by this package may need a
libstdc++ newer than the one on the host system.  Either use `LD_LIBRARY_PATH`
to point at the packaged libstdc++, or compile with `-Wl,-R<path>` to embed an
RPATH into the binary.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Clang-redist-linux
tagline: Linux package containing Clang and libstdc++ binaries
